<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>false</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>interaction_json_blob</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Skill determination for Interaction[HR]</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
if (current.value.changes()) { // Add your code here var interaction = new GlideRecord('interaction'); interaction.addQuery('context_document', current.getUniqueValue()); interaction.query(); if (interaction.next()) { var skillUtils = new sn_skill_rule.SkillDeterminationUtils(); var skills = skillUtils.determineWorkItemSkills(interaction); skillUtils.assignSkillsToWorkItem(skills, interaction); } }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-12 14:36:47</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>04fcfee70ff2001048a7c8337a767e27</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Skill determination for Interaction[HR]</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Advanced Work Assignment for HRSM" source="sn_hr_awa">2648e0d377573300f178e431a9106163</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Advanced Work Assignment for HRSM">2648e0d377573300f178e431a9106163</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_04fcfee70ff2001048a7c8337a767e27</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-02-13 03:04:41</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=04fcfee70ff2001048a7c8337a767e27"/> </record_update>
